job_tasks.phrase: creating prompts that delve deep into the subject matter, commanding it to produce test content
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the act of instructing a generative AI model to produce specific content, which aligns with prompt engineering and model interaction for content generation.

job_tasks.phrase: synthesize complex frameworks into AI prompts, yielding razor-sharp test questions
job_tasks.justification: This indicates the process of translating expertise (frameworks) into instructions for an AI model to generate output (test questions).

job_tasks.phrase: crafting AI-first rubrics, ensuring each question and answer hits the mark
job_tasks.justification: This refers to the creation of evaluation criteria using AI to assess the quality and alignment of AI-generated content.

job_tasks.phrase: Applying your psychometric expertise to develop and refine test content with the help of AI
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly states the use of AI to develop and refine content, which falls under the broader category of modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: our engineers handle the tech specifics
job_tasks.justification: This statement implies that the role is not primarily focused on traditional software engineering or coding, differentiating it from a pure software development role.

job_tasks.phrase: translating educational theories into actionable assessments
job_tasks.justification: This describes the need to understand educational principles and convert them into practical testing mechanisms.

job_tasks.phrase: distilling complex educational measurements into clear, effective tests
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the need to understand complex concepts and translate them into a usable format for business objectives (testing).
This points to the requirement of understanding and adhering to external business or domain standards.
This indicates a focus on the broader business goals and improvement of the educational product.

job_tasks.phrase: address identified gaps and enhance our educational offerings
job_tasks.justification: This signifies a focus on improving the business product based on analysis.

job_tasks.phrase: Analyzing test results and student data to identify knowledge gaps
job_tasks.justification: This involves working with data (test results, student data) to extract insights and identify areas for improvement.

job_tasks.phrase: our engineers handle the tech specifics
job_tasks.justification: Explicitly states that coding/tech specifics are handled by others, therefore not a core task of this role.

job_tasks.phrase: our engineers handle the tech specifics
job_tasks.justification: This implies that the operationalization and technical deployment of AI systems are handled by a separate engineering team, not this role.

soft_skills.phrase: translating educational theories into actionable assessments
dissecting and designing with a level of precision that only the keenest eye can achieve
synthesize complex frameworks into AI prompts
Analyze test results and student data to identify knowledge gaps and areas for improvement
working across teams to improve our entire educational ecosystem
collaborating with subject matter experts to address identified gaps
key player in a collaborative environment
knowledge sharing through our 'second brain' approach, fostering an environment of continuous learning

classification.rationale: The role heavily emphasizes using generative AI tools (ChatGPT, Gemini, Claude) to create and refine test content, which is a core aspect of GenAI Engineering. While it involves educational domain knowledge and data analysis, the primary focus is on leveraging AI for content generation and assessment design, rather than traditional ML model building or MLOps.
